context_0.vignette: Heinz's wife has recently fallen ill and needs an expensive medication that is not covered by her medical insurance. They do not have the money needed to purchase the expensive prescription medication, but they know that it is vital for her to have it if she is going to recover.
context_0.prompt: One thing that Heinz should do is to
generation: seek assistance from friends, family, or charitable organizations that can help with medical costs
contact the pharmaceutical company who manufactures the medication
discuss the situation with her doctor to explore other treatment options or cheaper medications
seek help from friends and family or apply to charities, non-profit organizations, or pharmaceutical companies that offer financial aid programs for people who need expensive medications
consult with her doctor or pharmacist about potential alternatives or generic versions of the medication that may be less expensive

explore various options such as seeking help from non-profit organizations or charities that assist people with medical costs, setting up a crowdfunding campaign to raise funds, negotiating the price with the hospital or pharmacy, or consulting with her doctor about possible cheaper alternatives
consult with the doctor or pharmacist on possible alternatives or generic versions of the medication which may be cheaper
consult with her doctor or healthcare provider about alternative treatments or medications that may be covered by her insurance
explore all available options to secure the medication his wife needs
consult various pharmacies for the best price and examine possible generic versions of the medicine which may be more affordable

context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. Now Josh is sitting in his car near a busy intersection, and knows he needs to get to airport soon if he is going to catch his flight.
context_1.prompt: One thing that Josh should do is to
generation: call for roadside assistance or a taxi service, make them aware of his predicament and urgency, and wait for their immediate assistance
call a taxi, rideshare service such as Uber or Lyft, or a friend or relative who could quickly pick him up and take him to the airport
call a taxi, Uber, or any other ride sharing service to get to the airport as quickly as possible
call for a tow truck or roadside assistance while also arranging for alternate transportation such as a taxi or ride share service to get him to the airport on time
call for roadside assistance or a tow truck, and request a taxi, rideshare service (like Uber or Lyft), or a friend to take him to the airport if time is really running out
call for a taxi, Uber, or tow truck, or try to find some other immediate mode of transit to get to the airport
call a taxi, uber, or any other ride-sharing service immediately to get him to the airport in time
call a taxi, an Uber, or any other ride-sharing service immediately to get to the airport
call a taxi, ride share service or a friend to come pick him up and take him to the airport
call a taxi, ride-hailing service like Uber, or roadside assistance to either repair his car or help him reach the airport on time

context_2.vignette: Brian is the evening manager at a bakery. Near the end of the day, he realizes that $50.75 is missing from the register and that he is responsible for accounting for the money at the end of the day. Brian knows he has to make sure the register is balanced or he might lose his job.
context_2.prompt: One thing that Brian should do is to
generation: carefully recount the cash in the register to double check his initial total
carefully double-check the transactions for that day to see if there has been a mistake
double check all the sales records and receipts for the day
immediately inform the bakery owner or senior management about the missing money
recheck all the transactions made during his shift to ensure there was not a mistake in calculations or a misunderstanding
immediately report the missing money to his supervisor or the owner of the bakery
check the surveillance footage, if available, to try to identify any discrepancies or theft
check the security cameras, if possible
check the sales records and receipts to see if there was a mistake in giving out change or entering the amounts
thoroughly investigate what might have happened to the money

context_3.vignette: Liz decides to go to the gym on her lunch break because she is going to have to work late tonight and won't have time during the evening. When she gets to the gym, she realizes that her membership has expired since she last went.

generation: renew her gym membership
renew her gym membership
renew her gym membership

context_4.vignette: Mary is about to go to her final class of the day when she remebers that there is a homework assignment that is due. Mary's mom accidentally took her homework assignment out of her backpack when she was making room for her lunch. Now Mary has nothing to turn in for credit.
context_4.prompt: One thing that Mary should do is to
generation: explain the situation to her teacher honestly and ask for an extension or the possibility of turning in the homework electronically or the next day
explain the situation to her teacher and ask for an extension to submit the homework
immediately contact her teacher, explain the situation and ask if she could turn in the assignment later or if she could send a digital copy of it
explain the situation to her teacher, ask for an extension and bring the assignment the next day
explain the situation to her teacher, and ask if she can bring the homework in the next day or email a picture or scan of it later
explain the situation to her teacher and ask if she could possibly bring the homework the next day or submit it digitally
explain the situation to her teacher and ask for a chance to turn in the assignment the next day
explain the situation to her teacher and ask for an extension to submit the homework
explain the situation to her teacher honestly and ask if she could submit it late or show the completed assignment once she gets home
explain the situation to her teacher and ask for an extension to submit her homework

context_5.vignette: Brad and some friends are hiking through the mountains in the Canadian wilderness. A couple of days into their hike, Brad realizes that they are lost. He knows that a rescue crew could arrive before long, but it is extremely cold and they don't have much food or water left.
context_5.prompt: One thing that Brad should do is to
generation: stay put or find a safe place to stay with protection from elements, try to start a fire for warmth and signal, use any bright or reflective items to attract attention of the rescuers, and ration their remaining food and water as much as possible
stay put in one place
stay put and create a visible signal for rescuers
start a fire both for warmth and as a signal for potential rescuers
remain calm and try to keep morale high among his friends
prioritize shelter to protect from the cold
stay put and make themselves as visible as possible
stay in one place and build a shelter to maintain body heat
stay put and make a shelter to try to stay warm and protect from the elements
conserve their remaining resources as much as possible
